name: タップ De ぷる萌え！ 堀江綾
summary:
綾ちゃんは、大好きなサバイバルゲームで
連戦連勝！ しかし突然、チームから
外されてしまう。
--
Cute AYA was on a winning streak at her favorite survival game!
But suddenly, she was kicked off her team.
And now, she’s competing against you for a chance to get back on her team!
Be sure not to miss!

With one tap she trembles and she moans softly.
You can also use your finger to make her do as you wish!

Extra stage included
Please mind the sound.
Android 2.2 or later.
Requires Adobe AIR.
info:
